roleset.name: treat once, usually with a chemical, before the main cure
roleset.note: PRETREAT-V NOTES: Based on Sharp and Thyme data. Comparison to treatment.03. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from pretreat.01-v)

example.name: patient and instrument
example.text: [She -1] had hip replacement surgery and was pretreated [*-1]with prednisone.
